Name: Gallows
About the game: In a fantastic world with full of magic, dragons, underground creatures and heavenly creatures; let's see if our hero LERO is going to save the good people of realm from the evil by using his skills. Destiny of the realm is in your hands... Lero has a progressive structure with various sections.It is an immersive platform game with various obstacles and puzzles.It is necessary to transcend obstacles with different environments and to progress with the story focused. We prepared 5 episodes for the start in accordance with the story.You will experience elements that add a lot of excitement and puzzlement in the sections.
